text: Ashburn is a census-designated place (CDP) in Loudoun County, Virginia. As of the 2020 United States Census, its population was 46,349. It is northwest of Washington, D.C.. 70 percent of the world's Internet traffic passes through Ashburn.https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/capital- business/wp/2014/03/05/why-ashburn-va-is-the-center-of-the-internet/ ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Virginia
title: Ashburn, Virginia
